verses.verse: In the end <S%G3796><s%> of the sabbath, <S%G4521><s%> as it began <S%G2020><s%> to dawn <S%G2020><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> the first <S%G3391><s%> day of the week, <S%G4521><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> Magdalene <S%G3094><s%> and the other <S%G243><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> to see <S%G2334><s%> the sepulcher. <S%G5028><s%>

And, behold, <S%G2400><s%> there was a great <S%G3173><s%> earthquake: <S%G4578><s%> for the angel <S%G32><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> descended <S%G2597><s%> from heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and came <S%G4334><s%> and rolled <S%G617><s%> back <S%G617><s%> the stone <S%G3037><s%> from the door, <S%G2374><s%> and sat <S%G2521><s%> on it.
His countenance <S%G2397><s%> was like <S%G5613><s%> lightning, <S%G796><s%> and his raiment <S%G1742><s%> white <S%G3022><s%> as snow: <S%G5510><s%>
And for fear <S%G5401><s%> of him the keepers <S%G5083><s%> did shake, <S%G4579><s%> and became <S%G1096><s%> as dead <S%G3498><s%> men.

And the angel <S%G32><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to the women, <S%G1135><s%> Fear <S%G5399><s%> not you: for I know <S%G1492><s%> that you seek <S%G2212><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was crucified. <S%G4717><s%>

He is not here: <S%G5602><s%> for he is risen, <S%G1453><s%> as he said. <S%G2036><s%> Come, <S%G1205><s%> see <S%G1492><s%> the place <S%G5117><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> lay. <S%G2749><s%>

And go <S%G4198><s%> quickly, <S%G5035><s%> and tell <S%G2036><s%> his disciples <S%G3101><s%> that he is risen <S%G1453><s%> from the dead; <S%G3498><s%> and, behold, <S%G2400><s%> he goes <S%G4254><s%> before <S%G4254><s%> you into <S%G1519><s%> Galilee; <S%G1056><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> shall you see <S%G3700><s%> him: see, <S%G2400><s%> I have told <S%G2036><s%> you.

And they departed <S%G1831><s%> quickly <S%G5035><s%> from the sepulcher <S%G3419><s%> with fear <S%G5401><s%> and great <S%G3173><s%> joy; <S%G5479><s%> and did run <S%G5143><s%> to bring <S%G518><s%> his disciples <S%G3101><s%> word. <S%G518><s%>

And as they went <S%G4198><s%> to tell <S%G518><s%> his disciples, <S%G3101><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> met <S%G528><s%> them, saying, <S%G3004><s%> All hail. <S%G5463><s%> And they came <S%G4334><s%> and held <S%G2902><s%> him by the feet, <S%G4228><s%> and worshipped <S%G4352><s%> him.

Then <S%G5119><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> to them, Be not afraid: <S%G5399><s%> go <S%G565><s%> tell <S%G518><s%> my brothers <S%G80><s%> that they go <S%G5217><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> and there <S%G1563><s%> shall they see <S%G3700><s%> me.

Now <S%G1161><s%> when they were going, <S%G4198><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> of the watch <S%G2892><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the city, <S%G4172><s%> and showed <S%G518><s%> to the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> all <S%G537><s%> the things that were done. <S%G1096><s%>

And when they were assembled <S%G4863><s%> with the elders, <S%G4245><s%> and had taken <S%G2983><s%> counsel, <S%G4824><s%> they gave <S%G1325><s%> large <S%G2425><s%> money <S%G694><s%> to the soldiers, <S%G4757><s%>
Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Say <S%G2036><s%> you, His disciples <S%G3101><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> by night, <S%G3571><s%> and stole <S%G2813><s%> him away while we slept. <S%G2837><s%>
And if <S%G1437><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> come <S%G191><s%> to the governor's <S%G2232><s%> ears, <S%G191><s%> we will persuade <S%G3982><s%> him, and secure <S%G4160><s%> <S%G275><s%> you.

So <S%G1161><s%> they took <S%G2983><s%> the money, <S%G694><s%> and did <S%G4160><s%> as they were taught: <S%G1321><s%> and this <S%G3778><s%> saying <S%G3056><s%> is commonly <S%G1310><s%> reported <S%G1310><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> until <S%G3360><s%> this <S%G4594><s%> day. <S%G4594><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> the eleven <S%G1733><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> went <S%G4198><s%> away into <S%G1519><s%> Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a mountain <S%G3735><s%> where <S%G3757><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had appointed <S%G5021><s%> them.
And when they saw <S%G1492><s%> him, they worshipped <S%G4352><s%> him: but some <S%G3588><s%> doubted. <S%G1365><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> and spoke <S%G2980><s%> to them, saying, <S%G3004><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> is given <S%G1325><s%> to me in heaven <S%G3772><s%> and in earth. <S%G1093><s%>

Go <S%G4198><s%> you therefore, <S%G3767><s%> and teach <S%G3100><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> nations, <S%G1484><s%> baptizing <S%G907><s%> them in the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Father, <S%G3962><s%> and of the Son, <S%G5207><s%> and of the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost: <S%G4151><s%>

Teaching <S%G1321><s%> them to observe <S%G5083><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things whatever <S%G3745><s%> I have commanded <S%G1781><s%> you: and, see, <S%G2400><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> with you always, <S%G3956><s%> <S%G2250><s%> even to the end <S%G4930><s%> of the world. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
